channel.title: The Mwenda Chronicles
channel.description: Building early — from campus to company.

item.title: Building Before You’re Ready
item.description: Why waiting for perfect conditions keeps most people stuck, and how starting early compounds faster than talent ever will.

item.title: Top AI Tools for Student Entrepreneurs
item.description: How AI quietly became my secret weapon for balancing campus life and building a business.

item.title: AI Tools That Run My Business
item.description: A deep dive into the automation stack I use to handle content creation, site reports, and project management.

item.title: Scaling a Campus Side Hustle: From Small Wins to Serious Income
item.description: Scaling isn’t about grinding 24/7 or skipping classes. It’s about turning effort into leverage. Here is how to grow a campus hustle the smart way.
